00038 #ifndef EGS_VECTOR_
00039 #define EGS_VECTOR_
00040 
00041 #include "egs_libconfig.h"
00042 
00043 #include "egs_math.h"
00044 
00055 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_Vector {
00056 
00057 public:
00058 
00059   EGS_Float x; 
00060   EGS_Float y; 
00061   EGS_Float z; 
00062 
00063   EGS_Vector(EGS_Float xx, EGS_Float yy, EGS_Float zz) : x(xx), y(yy), z(zz) {};
00064   EGS_Vector(const EGS_Vector &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {};
00065   EGS_Vector() : x(0), y(0), z(0) {};
00066 
00067   EGS_Vector &operator=(const EGS_Vector &v) {
00068     x = v.x; y = v.y; z = v.z;
00069     return *this;
00070   };
00071 
00072   // EGS_Vector additions
00073   //
00074   EGS_Vector operator+(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00075       return EGS_Vector(x+v.x, y+v.y, z+v.z);
00076   };
00077   EGS_Vector &operator+=(const EGS_Vector &v) {
00078     x += v.x; y += v.y; z += v.z; return *this;
00079   };
00080 
00081   // EGS_Vector substractions
00082   //
00083   EGS_Vector operator-(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00084     return EGS_Vector(x-v.x,y-v.y,z-v.z);
00085   }
00086   EGS_Vector &operator-=(const EGS_Vector &v) {
00087     x -= v.x; y -= v.y; z -= v.z; return *this;
00088   };
00089 
00090   // EGS_Vector multiplications
00091   //
00092   EGS_Vector operator*(const EGS_Float f) const {
00093       return EGS_Vector(x*f,y*f,z*f);
00094   };
00095   EGS_Vector &operator*=(const EGS_Float f) {
00096     x *= f; y *= f; z *= f; return *this;
00097   };
00098   friend EGS_Vector operator*(EGS_Float f, EGS_Vector &v) {
00099     return v*f;
00100   };
00101   EGS_Float operator*(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00102     return x*v.x + y*v.y + z*v.z;
00103   };
00104 
00105   // vector product
00106   EGS_Vector times(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00107       return EGS_Vector(y*v.z-z*v.y, z*v.x-x*v.z, x*v.y-y*v.x);
00108   };
00109   EGS_Vector operator%(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00110       return EGS_Vector(y*v.z-z*v.y, z*v.x-x*v.z, x*v.y-y*v.x);
00111   };
00112 
00113   // scale
00114   EGS_Vector getScaled(const EGS_Vector &s) const {
00115       return EGS_Vector(x*s.x,y*s.y,z*s.z);
00116   };
00117   void scale(const EGS_Vector &s) {
00118       x *= s.x; y *= s.y; z *= s.z;
00119   };
00120 
00121   // Some other useful methods.
00122   EGS_Float length() const { return sqrt(x*x+y*y+z*z); };
00123   EGS_Float length2() const { return x*x+y*y+z*z; };
00124   void normalize() {
00125       EGS_Float tmp = 1./length(); x *= tmp; y *= tmp; z *= tmp;
00126   };
00127 
00128   void rotate(EGS_Float cos_t, EGS_Float sin_t,
00129               EGS_Float c_phi, EGS_Float s_phi) {
00130     EGS_Float sin_z = x*x + y*y;
00131     if( sin_z > 1e-10 ) {
00132       sin_z = sqrt(sin_z);
00133       EGS_Float temp = sin_t/sin_z;
00134       EGS_Float temp_phi = z*c_phi;
00135       EGS_Float temp_x = x*cos_t; register EGS_Float temp_y = y*cos_t;
00136       EGS_Float temp_x1 = temp_phi*x-y*s_phi;
00137       EGS_Float temp_y1 = temp_phi*y+x*s_phi;
00138       x = temp*temp_x1+temp_x;
00139       y = temp*temp_y1+temp_y;
00140       z = z*cos_t-sin_z*sin_t*c_phi;
00141     }
00142     else {
00143       x = sin_t*c_phi; y = sin_t*s_phi; z *= cos_t;
00144     }
00145   };
00146 
00147 };
00148 
00149 #endif
